author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR reverts #35207, as that now conflicts with #35593 (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35593#issuecomment-939180555).

Keeping it as draft PR until @Martin-Grunewald can review.

#### PR validation:

No errors after running `addOnTests.py --tests=hlt_data_GRun` with #35593.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Undo update of Run-3 GTs in autoCondHLT
